verses.verse: "Now you son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> get <S%H3947><s%> yourself a brick, <S%H3843><s%> place <S%H5414><s%> it before <S%H6440><s%> you, and inscribe <S%H2710><s%> a city <S%H5892><s%> on it, Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

"Then lay <S%H5414><s%> siege <S%H4692><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> it, build <S%H1129><s%> a siege <S%H1785><s%> wall, <S%H1785><s%> raise <S%H8210><s%> up a ramp, <S%H5550><s%> pitch <S%H5414><s%> camps, <S%H4264><s%> and place <S%H7760><s%> battering <S%H3733><s%> rams <S%H3733><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> it all <S%H5439><s%> around. <S%H5439><s%>

"Then get <S%H3947><s%> yourself an iron <S%H1270><s%> plate <S%H4227><s%> and set <S%H5414><s%> it up as an iron <S%H1270><s%> wall <S%H7023><s%> between <S%H996><s%> you and the city, <S%H5892><s%> and set <S%H3559><s%> your face <S%H6440><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> it so that it is under siege, <S%H4692><s%> and besiege <S%H6696><s%> <S%H5921><s%> it. This <S%H1931><s%> is a sign <S%H226><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

"As for you, lie <S%H7901><s%> down <S%H7901><s%> on your left <S%H8042><s%> side, <S%H6654><s%> and lay <S%H7760><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> on it; you shall bear <S%H5375><s%> their iniquity <S%H5771><s%> for the number <S%H4557><s%> of days <S%H3117><s%> that you lie <S%H7901><s%> on it.

"For I have assigned <S%H5414><s%> you a number <S%H4557><s%> of days <S%H3117><s%> corresponding to the years <S%H8141><s%> of their iniquity, <S%H5771><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and ninety <S%H8673><s%> days; <S%H3117><s%> thus you shall bear <S%H5375><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

"When you have completed <S%H3615><s%> these, <S%H428><s%> you shall lie <S%H7901><s%> down <S%H7901><s%> a second <S%H8145><s%> time, <S%H8145><s%> [but] on your right <S%H3233><s%> side, <S%H6654><s%> and bear <S%H5375><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah; <S%H3063><s%> I have assigned <S%H5414><s%> it to you for forty <S%H705><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> a day <S%H3117><s%> for each year. <S%H8141><s%>

"Then you shall set <S%H3559><s%> your face <S%H6440><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> the siege <S%H4692><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> with your arm <S%H2220><s%> bared, <S%H2834><s%> and prophesy <S%H5012><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> it.

"Now behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will put <S%H5414><s%> ropes <S%H5688><s%> on you so that you cannot <S%H3808><s%> turn <S%H2015><s%> from one side <S%H6654><s%> to the other, <S%H6654><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> you have completed <S%H3615><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of your siege. <S%H4692><s%>

"But as for you, take <S%H3947><s%> wheat, <S%H2406><s%> barley, <S%H8184><s%> beans, <S%H6321><s%> lentils, <S%H5742><s%> millet <S%H1764><s%> and spelt, <S%H3698><s%> put <S%H5414><s%> them in one <S%H259><s%> vessel <S%H3627><s%> and make <S%H6213><s%> them into bread <S%H3899><s%> for yourself; you shall eat <S%H398><s%> it according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the days <S%H3117><s%> that you lie <S%H7901><s%> on your side, <S%H6654><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and ninety <S%H8673><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>

"And your food <S%H3978><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you eat <S%H398><s%> [shall be] twenty <S%H6242><s%> shekels <S%H8255><s%> a day <S%H3117><s%> by weight; <S%H4946><s%> you shall eat <S%H398><s%> it from time <S%H6256><s%> to time. <S%H6256><s%>

"And the water <S%H4325><s%> you drink <S%H8354><s%> will be the sixth <S%H8345><s%> part <S%H8345><s%> of a hin <S%H1969><s%> by measure; <S%H4884><s%> you shall drink <S%H8354><s%> it from time <S%H6256><s%> to time. <S%H6256><s%>

"And you shall eat <S%H398><s%> it as a barley <S%H8184><s%> cake, <S%H5692><s%> having baked <S%H5746><s%> [it] in their sight <S%H5869><s%> over human <S%H120><s%> dung. <S%H1561><s%> <S%H6627><s%>"

Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Thus <S%H3602><s%> shall the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> their bread <S%H3899><s%> unclean <S%H2931><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> I shall banish <S%H5080><s%> them."

But I said, <S%H559><s%> "Ah, Lord <S%H136><s%> God! <S%H3068><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I have never <S%H3808><s%> been <S%H2930><s%> defiled; <S%H2930><s%> for from my youth <S%H5271><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> now <S%H6258><s%> I have never <S%H3808><s%> eaten <S%H398><s%> what <S%H5038><s%> died <S%H5038><s%> of itself or was torn <S%H2966><s%> by beasts, <S%H2966><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> has any unclean <S%H6292><s%> meat <S%H1320><s%> ever entered <S%H935><s%> my mouth. <S%H6310><s%>"

Then He said <S%H559><s%> to me, "See, <S%H7200><s%> I shall give <S%H5414><s%> you cow's dung <S%H6832><s%> in place <S%H8478><s%> of human <S%H120><s%> dung <S%H1561><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> which you will prepare <S%H6213><s%> your bread. <S%H3899><s%>"

Moreover, He said <S%H559><s%> to me, "Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am going to break <S%H7665><s%> the staff <S%H4294><s%> of bread <S%H3899><s%> in Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> and they will eat <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> by weight <S%H4948><s%> and with anxiety, <S%H1674><s%> and drink <S%H8354><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> by measure <S%H4884><s%> and in horror, <S%H8078><s%>

because <S%H4616><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> and water <S%H4325><s%> will be scarce; <S%H2637><s%> and they will be appalled <S%H8074><s%> with one <S%H376><s%> another <S%H251><s%> and waste <S%H4743><s%> away <S%H4743><s%> in their iniquity. <S%H5771><s%>
